description: Structured information on a tissue sample.
label: Tissue sample
name: TissueSample

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi._instruction: Add all anatomical entities that describe the anatomical location of this tissue sample.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi.label: Anatomical location
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi.name: anatomicalLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/biologi._instruction: Add the biological sex of this specimen.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/biologi.description: Differentiation of individuals of most species (animals and plants) based on the type of gametes they produce.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/biologi.label: Biological sex
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/biologi.name: biologicalSex

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this specimen that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this specimen.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO._instruction: Add all tissue sample collections this tissue sample is part of.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.label: Is part of
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lateral._instruction: Add one or both sides of the body, bilateral organ or bilateral organ part that this tissue sample originates from.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lateral.description: Differentiation between a pair of lateral homologous parts of the body.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lateral.label: Laterality
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lateral.name: laterality

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this specimen that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/origin._instruction: Add the biogical origin of this tissue sample.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/origin.description: Source at which something begins or rises, or from which something derives.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/origin.label: Origin
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/origin.name: origin

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/species._instruction: Add the species or strain (a sub-type of a genetic variant of species) of this specimen.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/species.description: Category of biological classification comprising related organisms or populations potentially capable of interbreeding, and being designated by a binomial that consists of the name of a genus followed by a Latin or latinized uncapitalized noun or adjective.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/species.label: Species
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/species.name: species

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/studied._instruction: Add all states in which this tissue sample was studied.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/studied.description: Reference to a point in time at which something or someone was studied in a particular mode or condition.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/studied.label: Studied state
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/studied.name: studiedState

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type._instruction: Add the type of this tissue sample.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.label: Type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.name: type
